Html:
Hi,

I want to use message token to send messages throught my app, I have several instances of the window and I want to send it to a specific window, so I use an int ID.

But the SendToList method use item.Token == token instead of item.Token.Equals(token).

I dont have the references to the same objects.

Can you change this behavior in the next build?

 

Thanks

Rafael Carlos

Ah doh... yes of course I will change it, sorry for that.

Cheers,

Laurent

The bug is fixed in the latest changeset.

Cheers,

Laurent
